org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc

Class SimpleServerRpcConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.ServerRpcConnection
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.SimpleServerRpcConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
class SimpleServerRpcConnection
extends ServerRpcConnection
    Reads calls from a connection and queues them for handling.

      • readAndProcess

        public int readAndProcess()
                   throws IOException,
                          InterruptedException
        Read off the wire. If there is not enough data to read, update the connection state with what we have and returns.
        Returns:
        Returns -1 if failure (and caller will close connection), else zero or more.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
